name: intercorrelation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of numbers, facts, etc. being closely related to one another, or the degree to which they are related: intercorrelation of The intercorrelation of these two variables is only 0.251. Despite substantial inter-correlation, the relationship between these subskills is not perfect.
More examplesFewer examplesSome of these factors showed a significant intercorrelation.Owing to the intercorrelation of the seventeen variables, only three reach statistical significance. The inter-correlation among the scales is shown in Table 1.
